mapper.select: select no, title, content, startDate, writeDate, endDate, updateDate from notice where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into notice(no, title, content, startDate, endDate) values(notice_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.update: update notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate} where no = #{no}
